word:
Today each one has a part to act--duties to perform and responsibilities to carry. No one can act his part acceptably without wisdom from on high. May God help us all to understand the prayer that He gave Solomon in the night season as a prayer appropriate for him to offer.--Letter 104, 1902. (To Luther Warren, July 8, 1902.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. July 15, 1982
